Reviews.Title: A big lie
Reviews.Author: pradeep
Reviews.Content: SUpposed to be IP-67 certified, a big lie , DO NOT BUY THIS, Water leaks in through the gap between screen and body, Skype calls just drop, 256MB RAM so apps unable to run properly,

Reviews.Content: as I said on previous occasion a screw came out defective, they can sell me a rear cover and three screws...?

Reviews.Title: Shockproof?!?!?!?
Reviews.Author: ze camargo
Reviews.Content: 20 days after received the item I was sitting and I dropped the device then the screen not worked any more......

Reviews.Title: Good smartphone for the price
Reviews.Author: Elisha
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my dad as he goes through phones like most people go through socks. He's a construction worker and tends to be a little more than ruff on electronics. There are a lot of weird little things about this phone. Screen sensitivity is spotty. It's either overly sensitive or not responsive and for whatever reason I can't find anything on how to calibrate the screen. There's also the issue of finding the ringer settings as I've yet to find them as well. Other than that this phone has been a blessing as it has survived being dropped more than once. It did not come with a manual which has made learning how to use this phone difficult as it does not have the standard settings of an android phone. It also came preloaded with a great deal of Chinese programs that I could not delete or understand what they were for as they were in Chinese. It did come with a Micro SD memory card which was nice and the forward and back cameras take great pictures. It was also nice that it came preloaded with a flashlight app on it. The only other downside to this phone was the loop where the belt clip attaches broke within the first week. This may not be a fault of the phone but a fault of my father's forgetfulness.
